About the Company: Menon Bearings Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of auto components. The Company manufactures a range of bi-metal Engine Bearings, Bushes and Thrust Washers for light and heavy automobile engines, Three-wheeler engines, as well as for compressors, refrigerators and air conditioners. The Company has developed Cast Copper Bimetal Strip for heavy duty applications. The Companys products include bearings, such as bearings for connecting rods, bearings for crank shafts, flanged bearings and trimetal bearings; bushes, such as truncated bushes for connecting rods, ball indented bushes, bushes for connecting rods, cam shafts, rock shafts and rocker arms, and thrust washers, such as washers with thrust face contours and ring type thrust washers. The Companys clients include General Motors, Tata, Cummins, Volvo, John Deere, Mack, Mahindra, Eicher, Maruti Suzuki, Honeywell and Arrow Engine Company.
